questions.question: Assuming you had an elevation attribute, you could use the AttributeFilter to filter your features into three streams: one with elevations below 100 meters, one with elevations between 100 and 200 meters, and one with elevations over 200 meters.

Assuming you had a price attribute, you could use the AttributeRangeFilter to filter your features into three streams: one with prices below $10, one with prices between $10 and $50, and one with prices over $50.
You can use the GeometryFilter to filter out features with invalid geometry.
